title: South Korea Set To Deploy 'StarWars' Laser Weapons For Drone Defence
content: South Korea on Thursday announced that it is ready to start mass-producing laser weapons like those in the 'Star Wars' franchise to shoot down North Korean drones.
summary: South Korea on Thursday announced that it is ready to start mass-producing laser weapons like those in the 'Star Wars' franchise to shoot down North Korean drones.

title: Indian Man, 25, Arrested For Groping At Canada Water Park
content: An Indian origin man was arrested for groping women at a public water park in Canada on July 7, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said in a statement.
summary: An Indian origin man was arrested for groping women at a public water park in Canada on July 7, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said in a statement.

title: Landslide Sweeps Two Passenger Bus In Central Nepal Highway, 60 Missing
content: At least five dozen people are suspected to be missing after a landslide along the Madan-Ashrit Highway in Central Nepal swept two passenger buses in early Friday morning.
summary: At least five dozen people are suspected to be missing after a landslide along the Madan-Ashrit Highway in Central Nepal swept two passenger buses in early Friday morning.

title: Alec Baldwin, Charged With Involuntary Manslaughter, Had Live Rounds On Set
content: Live rounds were found in the cartridge belts of Alec Baldwin and another actor on the set of a Western movie that was the scene of a fatal shooting, a police technician testified Thursday at the trial of the Hollywood star.
summary: Live rounds were found in the cartridge belts of Alec Baldwin and another actor on the set of a Western movie that was the scene of a fatal shooting, a police technician testified Thursday at the trial of the Hollywood star.

title: "Slips Of Tongue Happen": NATO Allies Back Gaffing Joe Biden
content: All was going according to plan. President Joe Biden was projecting himself as the leader of the free world as he hosted a NATO summit and then, in a moment, an embarrassing slip of the tongue.
summary: All was going according to plan. President Joe Biden was projecting himself as the leader of the free world as he hosted a NATO summit and then, in a moment, an embarrassing slip of the tongue.

title: In Latest Gaffe, Biden Calls Kamala Harris "Vice President Trump"
content: US President Joe Biden defiantly insisted Thursday that he will run for another term and win, as a series of verbal gaffes while leading a major summit threw a harsh new spotlight on his fitness.
summary: US President Joe Biden defiantly insisted Thursday that he will run for another term and win, as a series of verbal gaffes while leading a major summit threw a harsh new spotlight on his fitness.

title: Ukraine Seizes Foreign Cargo Ship That "Looted" Grain From Crimea
content: Kyiv said Thursday that it had seized a foreign cargo ship and detained its captain, alleging that the vessel had illegally exported Ukrainian grain from the annexed Crimean peninsula.
summary: Kyiv said Thursday that it had seized a foreign cargo ship and detained its captain, alleging that the vessel had illegally exported Ukrainian grain from the annexed Crimean peninsula.

title: "Ready To Undergo Neurological Exam If Doctors Recommend": Joe Biden
content: Amid the mounting pressure from fellow Democrats to end his re-election campaign, US President Joe Biden has indicated willingness to undergo a neurological exam to address concerns about his mental fitness for office.
summary: Amid the mounting pressure from fellow Democrats to end his re-election campaign, US President Joe Biden has indicated willingness to undergo a neurological exam to address concerns about his mental fitness for office.

title: Explained: Why Biden Is Ignoring Fellow Democrats' Calls To Leave Race
content: Shortly after President Joe Biden's halting debate with Donald Trump on June 27, his exit from the 2024 U.S. presidential race seemed all but inevitable to some longtime allies.
summary: Shortly after President Joe Biden's halting debate with Donald Trump on June 27, his exit from the 2024 U.S. presidential race seemed all but inevitable to some longtime allies.

title: Biden Says He'd Still Be Able To "Deal" With Putin, Xi Jinping In 3 Years
content: US President Joe Biden said Thursday he would still be ready to deal with Russian leader Vladimir Putin and China's Xi Jinping well into a second term as he faced questions over his advancing years and fitness for office.
summary: US President Joe Biden said Thursday he would still be ready to deal with Russian leader Vladimir Putin and China's Xi Jinping well into a second term as he faced questions over his advancing years and fitness for office.

title: "Great Job Joe": Trump Mocks Biden Gaffes In Middle Of NATO Press Meet
content: Donald Trump on Thursday mocked Joe Biden while the US president, who is under huge pressure due to concerns over his mental fitness, made verbal slips during a high-stakes press conference.
summary: Donald Trump on Thursday mocked Joe Biden while the US president, who is under huge pressure due to concerns over his mental fitness, made verbal slips during a high-stakes press conference.

title: 'I'M The Most Qualified Person To Run For President", Says Biden
content: US President Joe Biden said Thursday he was the "most qualified" American to take on Donald Trump in November's presidential election as he faced growing calls from within his own party to step down.
summary: US President Joe Biden said Thursday he was the "most qualified" American to take on Donald Trump in November's presidential election as he faced growing calls from within his own party to step down.

title: Macron Says France Will Continue To Support Ukraine "As Long As Necessary"
content: US President Joe Biden was "in charge" and on top of matters at a NATO summit with fellow leaders in Washington, French President Emmanuel Macron said Thursday.
summary: US President Joe Biden was "in charge" and on top of matters at a NATO summit with fellow leaders in Washington, French President Emmanuel Macron said Thursday.

title: Biden Campaign Quietly Tests Kamala Harris Against Trump: Report
content: As President Joe Biden faces mounting pressure over the future of his candidacy, his campaign is quietly testing Vice President Kamala Harris's viability against former President Donald Trump through a voter survey, New York Times reported.
summary: As President Joe Biden faces mounting pressure over the future of his candidacy, his campaign is quietly testing Vice President Kamala Harris's viability against former President Donald Trump through a voter survey, New York Times reported.

title: Watch: Biden Introduces Zelensky As "President Putin" In Another Gaffe
content: U.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday mistakenly referred to Ukrainian President Volodymr Zelenskiy as "President Putin" before correcting himself at the NATO summit in Washington.
summary: U.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday mistakenly referred to Ukrainian President Volodymr Zelenskiy as "President Putin" before correcting himself at the NATO summit in Washington.

title: Covid Still Kills 1,700 A Week Around World: WHO
content: Covid-19 is still killing around 1,700 people a week around the world, the World Health Organization said Thursday, as it urged at-risk populations to keep up with their vaccinations against the disease.
summary: Covid-19 is still killing around 1,700 people a week around the world, the World Health Organization said Thursday, as it urged at-risk populations to keep up with their vaccinations against the disease.

title: Russia Says US Missiles In Germany Signal Cold War
content: The United States' plan to periodically station long-range missiles in Germany will lead to Cold War-style confrontation between Russia and the West, the Kremlin said Thursday.
summary: The United States' plan to periodically station long-range missiles in Germany will lead to Cold War-style confrontation between Russia and the West, the Kremlin said Thursday.

title: Zelensky "Confident" Ukraine Will One Day Enter NATO
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said Thursday he was confident Ukraine would eventually join NATO after the alliance said the Russian-invaded country had an "irreversible" path to membership.
summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky said Thursday he was confident Ukraine would eventually join NATO after the alliance said the Russian-invaded country had an "irreversible" path to membership.

title: Russia Adds Putin Critic Alexei Navalny's Wife To List Of "Terrorists"
content: Russia on Thursday added opposition figure Yulia Navalnaya to its list of "terrorists" and "extremists," two days after it issued an arrest warrant for the exiled dissident.
summary: Russia on Thursday added opposition figure Yulia Navalnaya to its list of "terrorists" and "extremists," two days after it issued an arrest warrant for the exiled dissident.

title: Taiwan Detects Record 66 Chinese Aircraft Around Island In 24 Hours
content: Taiwan's defence ministry said Thursday it had detected 66 Chinese military aircraft around the island in a 24-hour window, a record-high this year, a day after it said Beijing was conducting exercises in nearby waters.
summary: Taiwan's defence ministry said Thursday it had detected 66 Chinese military aircraft around the island in a 24-hour window, a record-high this year, a day after it said Beijing was conducting exercises in nearby waters.
